You can access [the Manopt forum](https://groups.google.com/g/manopttoolbox) on Google Groups.

This is the right place to discuss math and Matlab code related to the use of Manopt.

You can also [report issues](https://github.com/NicolasBoumal/manopt/issues) and submit [pull requests](https://github.com/NicolasBoumal/manopt/pulls) directly on GitHub.

For questions related to Python and Julia code, please see [PyManopt.org](https://www.pymanopt.org) and [Manoptjl.org](https://www.manoptjl.org).
